content.description: The following question refers to the topic of Napoleon.
content.question: Great Britain’s ability to play a leading role in the allied coalition that eventually defeated Napoleon is best explained by its earlier

choices.label: creation of a national Protestant church
establishment of a global maritime empire
defeat of attempts to reestablish Catholic rule in Britain’

content.answer: establishment of a global maritime empire

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
